main.title: About Kartavya
main.subtitle: A student-led social organization at IIT (ISM) Dhanbad
main.description: Kartavya is dedicated to promoting social welfare and community development in and around the IIT (ISM) Dhanbad campus. We aim to make a lasting impact by addressing key social issues and providing a platform for meaningful community service.

initiatives.title: Educational Programs
initiatives.description: Provide tutoring, computer literacy classes, and scholarships to support the education of underprivileged children.

initiatives.title: Health Awareness
initiatives.description: Organizing health camps, awareness programs, and free medical check-ups to improve the well-being of the community.

initiatives.title: Environmental Care
initiatives.description: Conducting tree plantation drives & actively promoting eco-friendly practices to foster environmental responsibility.

photos.title: Annual Day Celebration 2024
photos.description: Students performing at the annual day celebration

support.title: Support & Recognition
support.description: Kartavya is supported by generous contributions from alumni, faculty members, and well-wishers. Our committed team of volunteers works tirelessly to bring about positive and sustainable change in the community.
